name: Vampire Garlic
description:
This is Vampire Garlic. A light puzzle platformer where you must reach your crypt without succumbing to the light. You can use the citizens of the town to replenish your strength but beware of the garlic in their blood which will slow you down. Beware of holy blood that will harm you. However, it seems to cleanse the garlic maybe that will be useful.

Controls:

 Z - jump 

X - drink blood 

Arrow keys to move

Controller buttons: 

A to jump 

X to drink blood
